name: Magical Whip
description:
The two apprentice wizards had
become lost amid a tangled sea of
trees. The Phantasmal Forest, a dark,
dangerous place ruled by monsters...
It bewitches people with its strange
power. The wizards can only use a
single spell – one that turns their
wands into a magical whip.

Defeat enemies and collect valuable
items as you battle your way through
the forest in this exciting action game.
You can select either the male or
female character and use their magical
whips to capture enemies and defeat
them.

Your magical whip doesn’t do much
damage on its own, but with combos,
it becomes a powerful weapon capable
of defeating a mighty dragon with a
single strike. Combos are performed
by capturing a falling enemy with your
magical whip and using the captured
monster to attack others.

Can the wizards escape the evil forest
before they become lost forever within
its darkness?

Features:

- 50 haunting stages to battle and
escape from.
- Master combos to increase magical
power.
- Earn a high rank to unlock a
hidden game mode.
- Discover and use items to your
advantage.
